Window

Class Storage.BoardModeItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • Window.Storage.BoardModeItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStorage.IBoardModeItem
    Enclosing class:
    Storage

    public static final class Storage.BoardModeItem
extends Object
implements IStorage.IBoardModeItem
    Implementation of IBoardModeItem sub-interface of IStorage It extends the TItem general purpose abstract class. Instances of this class represents an detailed settings of game.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(byte playerIndex,
                      String color,
                      boolean isAuto)
               throws TError
        Adds a player to the board mode option
        Specified by:
        addPlayer in interface IStorage.IBoardModeItem
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - Unique index of the player whether it be AI or human one
        color - The color code of player in html style like #cc0000
        isAuto - If true than AI player is generated otherwise a non-AI paler.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
